website_summaries.verdict: The MSI GE72 6QD Apache Pro provides respectable midrange gaming performance without breaking the bank, but there are better values out there if you're not going for a high-end system.
cons: GeForce GTX 960M graphics card isn't powerful enough for gaming at the highest settings

customer_reviews.title: Good price and it come by one of the best ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are a serious gamer (dota 2/ cs go/.) that is permantly on the go, and needs also to play new games on high presets, this is the machine you need!!! Good price and it come by one of the best sellers for laptops. Recommended to buy with coolmaster laptop cooler as it is getting a bit warm on high settings and 7+ hours gaming.
customer_reviews.author: lokitm

customer_reviews.title: Worth getting instead of the Razer blade or Alienware
customer_reviews.text: Very good laptop. the specs says it all. you can play pretty much most modern games like battlefield 1 on high settings. one problem is that its a bit bulky and a little heavy. the screen is amazing. If you want a portable gaming computer, this is the way to go. you might be thinking about getting the Razer Blade but it wont have the power to run high graphic games. you will need to buy the accessory that increases your GPU power and the accessory itself costs a fortune. with this you wont have to worry about that.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Poor engineering
customer_reviews.text: The first one I got I had to RMA because of a busted display. The second was usable but the display flickers every time you move it.Overall construction of the display panel is very shoddy and flimsy, The keyboard keys protrude from the base is a way that makes them easy to damage. The HDMI port doesn't work properly if you close the lid - you get audio problems with a lot of apps and frequent hard crashes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Carton

customer_reviews.title: The battery is not brilliant as expected from the laptop of this calibre
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says on the tin. The battery is not brilliant as expected from the laptop of this calibre. Only criticism I do have is the colour on the keyboard has started to come off. This means that I can see the lights inside the laptop. The extra fans is a good feature, but they can be noisey - headphones usually rectify this issue. I have to date player MW3, Black Ops, Warcry, Ghosts, Battlefield and they all seem to work perfectly even on high resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Rameez I.

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise a great laptop and has done everything expected of it
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived promptly and as described. A note for other buyers the keyboard layout is US not UK (so keys in the "incorrect" position), this is noted in the product description but to bring to it attention as I had missed this. Otherwise a great laptop and has done everything expected of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laptop! The only thing is that MSI messed ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent laptop! The only thing is that MSI messed up some keys, but they also provide an utility to fix some of the problems. I can live with it, but it's a pity. The rest is very good. Windows 10 meeds some stabilization effort.
customer_reviews.author: L. Venturi

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend if you need a gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: Superb laptop! I use it for gaming mainly, and it preforms absolutely amazingly. Recently I've been playing Battlefield 4 on ultra had no issues with anything else I through at it. Highly recommend if you need a gaming laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Clark

customer_reviews.title: Amazing laptop, super powerful and plays virtually all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing laptop, super powerful and plays virtually all the latest games on ultra or at least on Very high settings. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Carlo Dema

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my MSI and I got the the 256GB SSD ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have never gotten a gaming PC before then this is for you, I absolutely love my MSI and I got the the 256GB SSD and it is worth it. Only if you have the money to waste on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kieran H.

customer_reviews.title: otherwise an amazing looking laptop
customer_reviews.text: Initial scare with a dodgy 'sleep' error, but that was the only thing amiss, otherwise an amazing looking laptop, if a little loud. Seller was excellent with technical help
customer_reviews.author: Saam

customer_reviews.title: Great computer, solid at hell and playing games and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great computer, solid at hell and playing games and processing large amounts of data (two reasons I needed it). Long story short, it's a good machine and worth the money, if you have it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it, epic laptop with games performance and it ...
customer_reviews.text: love it,epic laptop with games performance and it looks as good as it functions.
customer_reviews.author: Ashli

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect
customer_reviews.text: Would have been 5 if it had a UK keyboard. Are there replacement keyboards or keys available?
customer_reviews.author: Emily Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Few Glitches. but love it!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I love the laptop in many ways. However there has been one problem with it, i believe the Graphic is overheating, Not 100% sure as i'm not a IT but it has a habit that after a while the screen flickers and go's black then the computer reboots itself, I'v been wondering if anyone else as had this problem? or is there is a fix for this problem? Overall its a every powerful gaming computer and love it, Just wish i could fix that one problem! If anyone - or creator can help it would be gratefully taken.. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: GoddessMystical

customer_reviews.title: the MSI GE72 6QF Apache Pro 001-HID1 IS used for ...
customer_reviews.text: the MSI GE72 6QF Apache Pro 001-HID1 IS used for top end gaming and computer studies at Uni and impresses students and tutors alike. exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.author: bg

customer_reviews.title: Expectations blown!
customer_reviews.text: Came quick and packaged well. This laptop is a beast. After not owning any form of pc/laptop for well over 2 years this demolished my expectations. Currently playing skyrim on ultra settings with a sold 40-60 fps, mostly 60. it does get a little warm after playing for a while but it's to be expected. The only downside with this is that it comes with an American keyboard. No £ symbol and the @ symbol is in the wrong place. Other than that I would highly reccomend this to anyone looking for a well priced gaming laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: I do have some issues with the pc! I ...
customer_reviews.text: I do have some issues with the pc! I cannot play no games on it even if is a gaming pc!
customer_reviews.author: NonStoShoppando

customer_reviews.title: i dont recomand. i made an order for the ...
customer_reviews.text: i dont recomand. i made an order for the last leptop and after 2 hours they cancel my comand and someone alse took the last laptop , they are unprofessionally
customer_reviews.author: Rob3rt

customer_reviews.title: Third party pirates.....beware!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy from heinzcd with love......third party trying to rob the innocent. Pc from msi might be fantastic but you won't see one from third party sites.
customer_reviews.author: Dez
